title: Idioms: Compliments (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Compliments subcategory within Idioms. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: To feel proud from getting many compliments.
cards.romaji: Takusan homerarete, hana ga takaku naru.
cards.japanese: たくさん褒められて、鼻が高くなる。
